text: This obsoletes IRM 4.27.5, Bankruptcy, Miscellaneous Provisions.

This IRM has been incorporated into IRM 4.27.2, Examiner Responsibilities, for content related to ﬁeld examiner responsibilities and into IRM 4.1.1.6.18, Prompt Determination Requests, for content related to Planning and Special Programs (PSP) responsibilities.

IRM Reference IRM Title Description of Change 4.27.5.1 Overview References to related IRMs was in- corporated in IRM 4.27.2.1.6, Related Resources. 4.27.5.2 Prompt Determination Requests Content was reviewed, updated as needed, and moved as appropriate to IRM 4.27.2.5.1, Prompt Determi- nation of Tax Liability, for tasks performed by ﬁeld examiners and IRM 4.1.1.6.18, Prompt Determina- tion Requests, for tasks performed by PSP. 4.27.5.2.1 PSP Processing of Prompt De- Content was reviewed, updated as terminations needed, and moved as appropriate to IRM 4.27.2.5.1, Prompt Determi- nation of Tax Liability, for tasks performed by ﬁeld examiners and IRM 4.1.1.6.18, Prompt Determina- tion Requests, for tasks performed by PSP. 4.27.5.3 Requests for Refund Content was reviewed, updated as needed, and moved as appropriate to IRM 4.27.2.5.2, Prompt Determi- nation of Tax Refund, for tasks performed by ﬁeld examiners and IRM 4.1.1.6.18, Prompt Determina- tion Requests, for tasks performed by PSP.
